Text.val: 11.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed DCRM/DUNH Blob to Unicode
15.03.2012 GB SCR17173 Extended list of parameters if BID705 is calls
Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- All parameters are mandatory (program is started from OXA720, where input

STP.TXT: At least on parameter is empty

Text.val: -- Build file names for general templates
-- Start producing XML File when no error occured.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_NO, DEBC_NAME, DEBC_ADDRESS, DEBC_CITY, DEBC_COUNTRY from :1/DEBC where DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and exists(select * from :1/DUNH where DUNH_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DUNH_DATE between ':4' and ':5') and not(exists(select * from :1/REPA where REPA_RPRT_TYPE = 'DUH' and REPA_ADMNNO = DEBC_ADMNO and REPA_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO and REPA_DEBH = DEBC_DEBH and REPA_DEBC = DEBC_DEBC and REPA_DATE = ':6')) order by DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC for fetch only

Text.val: -- Create a XNL file for every selected debtor
Copy final XML File to tamino queue
Copy of final XML File failed

-- Build filenames for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
.. write temp file with end tags
